Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory259.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Let Nanami go immediately! My friends in the real world are waiting for me to return!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pouting, Nanami swings her chainsaw around, and all the abnormal programs dare not approach her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: "Our kind must obtain physical bodies<//AVATAR> before Gestalt<//CAGE> removes us. We will replace the arrogant Constructs' minds and become whole.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'And all of us here need you, Nanami<//#%?#%?>... We all want to be your friends<//??SEE??>...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The flocking programs are all speaking nonsense and bowing to Nanami.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Is... is that so? Do you all need Nanami—do you all want to be Nanami's friend...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bugged Bunny', 3: 'Friend<//??SEE??>! Friend<//??SEE??>!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory259.png'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: "Ladies and gentlemen, this is the end of the line. Remember to bring your belongings with you, especially the socks! Don't forget the socks!"}

{3: 'The hat-wearing program bows to Chrome and points to the square before them. There he finds a large crowd of abnormal programs gathering together, alongside some panicking external consciousnesses.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Why are you helping us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: 'Why, why... Why is a raven like a writing desk?'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm sorry—what?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: "You don't know the answer, which means you aren't mad—that's good! The world doesn't need more madmen. You don't need it, and we don't need it either."}
{3: 'Chrome shakes his head and looks at you, confused.'}
{2: "Don't look at me. I don't know either.", 3: '24'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'We should KEEP wasting time and NOT destroy those abnormal programs!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Huh? Oh... right. Our priority should be rescuing Nanami. What's happening right now must be connected to those programs capturing her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That makes sense.', 3: '29'}
{3: 'But before you all charge the enemies, you see the abnormal programs parting, and among them is the Queen Program and Nanami walking together slowly, hand in hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Did you... did you come here to get Nanami?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami seems to want to run toward you, but the Queen Program puts a hand on her shoulder and holds her back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: "Do not hurry. Maybe they<//FLUTE> don't really want you to return to the real world<//NEW WORLD>?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "H-how's that possible?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: "You have brought them much trouble on this April Fool's Day<//CELEBRATE>. Perhaps they no longer see you as a friend<//??SEE??>...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's RIGHT! We DO mind! Nanami, we DON'T want you back!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Do... do you hate Nanami that much, Lucia?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "YES! We'll ALWAYS hate Nanami! EVERYONE thinks you're annoying! Aargh—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv tries to stop talking when she realizes how she sounds, but she is too late.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Lee, Nanami has brought you so much trouble... You must hate Nanami as well...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee knows he cannot possibly explain himself, so he instead chooses not to say anything. But to Nanami, it seems like Lee is just silently acknowledging what she has said.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's not like that... Nanami, they are...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami shakes her head and steps back, her expression devastated.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If no one likes Nanami, then maybe Nanami should stay here... At least the programs here said they needed me. They said they wanted to be my friend...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before your voice reaches Nanami, the massive Queen Program stands in your way.'}
{2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'Of course these people are the enemies who hate Nanami<//#%?#%?>, which means they are our enemies as well... We shall remove you from here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bugged Bunny', 3: 'Remove<//BEHEADED>! Remove<//BEHEADED>!'}
